page.title: 16ECOLOGY (WILD FLOWERS)
page.content: BECAUSE WE ARE A RURAL AREA WE ARE LUCKY AS WE HAVE VERY LITTLE IN THE WAY OF POLLUTION BY FACTORIES AND INDUSTRY. AS A RESULT THERE IS ALWAYS A VAST NUMBER OF FLOWERS TO BE FOUND IN THE WOODS AND HEDGEROWS. ON A WALK ONE GROUP FOUND TWENTY FIVE DIFFERENT TYPES OF FLOWER. THERE ARE ALWAYS A LARGE NUMBER OF DIFFERENT FLOWERS AT DIFFERENT TIMES OF THE YEAR BUT THIS GROUP WENT OUT IN JUNE AND FOUND, HORSE RADISH, CATSEAR, DANDELION, GROUNDSEL, TUTSAN, REDSHANK, CLARY, TANSY, VIOLET, PEPERWORT, BETONY, HENBIT, CUCKOO PINT, CAMPION, HERB ROBERT, BURDOCK, ANEMOME, BROOM, POPPY, HONEYSUCKLE, VETCH, SPEARWORT, SPEEDWELL, BUGLE, FOXGLOVE. THESE COMMON FLOWERS WERE FOUND IN A SMALL AREA AND IN OUR WHOLE BLOCK THERE MUST BE HUNDREDS OF DIFFERENT TYPES.
